name: Ansible
description: Distributed coordination layer - one agent, multiple bodies

tier.description: Node tier: backbone (always-on VPS) or edge (intermittent client)

nodeIdOverride.description: Override the node id for addressing within the mesh (useful in Docker where tailscale isn't available inside the container)

listenPort.description: WebSocket port for backbone nodes to listen on

listenHost.description: Host/IP for backbone WebSocket bind; defaults to detected Tailscale IP or 127.0.0.1

backbonePeers.description: WebSocket URLs of backbone peers to connect to

capabilities.description: Capabilities this node provides: always-on, local-files, gpu

injectContext.description: Inject shared ansible context into agent prompts

injectContextAgents.description: Optional allowlist of agent IDs that receive ansible context injection

dispatchIncoming.description: Auto-dispatch inbound ansible messages into agent turns

staleSeconds.description: Treat locks older than this as stale (default 300)

tier.label: Node Tier
tier.help: Backbone nodes are always-on servers that form the sync mesh. Edge nodes connect as clients.

nodeIdOverride.label: Node ID Override
nodeIdOverride.help: Use a stable name for the node id (recommended in Docker).

listenPort.label: Listen Port
listenPort.help: Port for the WebSocket server (backbone only)

listenHost.label: Listen Host
listenHost.help: Bind host/IP for backbone WebSocket listener (advanced)

backbonePeers.label: Backbone Peers
backbonePeers.help: WebSocket URLs of backbone nodes to sync with

capabilities.label: Capabilities
capabilities.help: What this node can do: always-on, local-files, gpu

injectContext.label: Inject Context
injectContext.help: Include ansible shared context in prompts before agent start

injectContextAgents.label: Inject Context Agents
injectContextAgents.help: Restrict ansible context injection to specific agent IDs

dispatchIncoming.label: Dispatch Incoming
dispatchIncoming.help: Auto-route inbound ansible messages into agent turns

lockSweep.label: Lock Sweep
lockSweep.help: Automatically clears stale session lock files that can block agent turns (recommended).
